participant_1.background:
I want a home where I can entertain my friends and play my Lindsey Stirling albums loud.
I want to have more fun with my siblings.
i work five days a week.
i enjoy karaoke every friday night.
i like to bake.

participant_2.background:
I'm going to try to talk to my spouse about spending more time together this weekend, even though I know it's a long shot.
my beer gut is so huge i have not seen my feet in two years.
I started a small business so I could spend more time with my family.
I get my creative energy from listening to music and trying to create my own.
i have been working the same job for two years.

content.text: Hi!
Hello! How are you doing?
I'm great! Just got back from a fun karaoke night.
Karaoke! Sounds like a lot of fun. Do you do it often?
I try to go once a week, it's a great way to relax and have fun.
I would love to try it but I'm too shy.
There's no need to be shy, everyone is up there doing their own thing.
Maybe I'll give it a try one of these days.
You should! It's a lot of fun and you'll make some new friends.
Thanks for the encouragement!
No problem! What do you like to do for fun?
I like to listen to music and create my own. I also like to spend time with my family.
That sounds great! I love music too. What kind of music do you like to listen to?
I like a little bit of everything, but I mostly listen to country music.
Oh that's cool! I'm not a huge country music fan, but I do like some of it.
Yeah it's not for everyone. What kind of music do you like to listen to?
I like a lot of different genres of music, but my favorites are probably rock, pop, and hip-hop.
Oh cool! I like some of those too.
It sounds like we have some similar interests.
Yeah it does! It's nice to meet someone who likes the same things.
Me too! I'm glad we got to chat.
Me too! Have a good day!
You too!
